actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to study and recommend remedial measures to stabilize the bank of the Illinois River at Hardin, Illinois.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to study and recommend remedial measures for bank stabilization of the Illinois River near Hardin, Illinois.

titles.title: A bill to study and recommend remedial measures to stabilize the bank of the Illinois River at Hardin, Illinois.
